title:
What is the large pipe placed along Burnt Mill Creek between Market Street and Princess Place Drive? How long will it be there? Also, will they ever clear the weeds around the man-made pond and bridge in the park between Chestnut Street and Princess Place Drive?

It has become an eyesore.
text:
Here's a link to the answer to one of your your questions.
